name: Jayant Patel
tagline: Building efficient eyes for edge devices.
bioHtml: I am a Junior Research Fellow (JRF) in Computer Science at IIT Indore. My research focuses on Computer Vision and Model Compression, specifically designing efficient YOLO architectures that maintain high accuracy on resource-constrained edge devices. Previously, I was a Research Intern evaluating YOLO models for PPE detection during my BTech.
